amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 119-38 to amend the threshold value at which gifts must be reported from $50,000 to $1.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to amend the threshold value at which gifts must be reported from $50,000 to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 321 (Roll no. 80).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 321 (Roll no. 80).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
